}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "P05-683400B" and "MADE IN TAIWAN" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :PCI Vid/Pid: [http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/1814/0201 1814:0201]/[http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/1462/6834 1462:6834]
